overview: From 2025-09-14 to 2025-09-15, elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge had 0 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: fix: knowledge panel loading
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* New Features
  * In-app PDF viewer with zoom/reset controls; shows “PDF Not Available” when content is missing.

* Improvements
  * Dynamic API base path from server config, supporting deployments under nested/plugin paths.
  * Consistent loading of frontend assets (CSS/JS) via the configured base path.
  * More reliable document list, upload, delete, and search requests using the configured base.
  * Minor header UI polish.

* Bug Fixes
  * Fixed broken assets and API calls when the app is not served from the root path.
  * Clearer error messages for asset loading issues.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
